festival.introText:
Creamfields, one of the world’s biggest electronic promoters, bring their second instalment of the huge 50,000 capacity two-day camping festival in 2023 which sees them bring their award-winning festival South, taking over the stunning Grade II listed Hylands Park for Creamfields South Chelmsford again.

With the iconic Hylands villa as its backdrop, the multi-stage festival will also give fans the chance to experience the colossal 15,000 capacity Steel Yard superstructure is scheduled to take place on Friday 26th May to Sunday 28th May 2023.

The launch of Creamfields Chelmsford is a game-changer for the UK festival landscape and coincides with the 25-year celebrations of its award-winning sister festival Creamfields Daresbury, which is staged annually in the heart of the Cheshire countryside and attracts sell-out audiences of 70,000.

Images above taken from Creamfields North.
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet of Creamfields South 2023. Get Creamfields South tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com

reviews.body:
Difficult obtaining upgrade tickets: no contactless, no facility to upgrade online or via bacs, initial payments rejected once attempted! 

Once in, really great vibe!! Gold vip hospitality was a nice touch. Music venue and atmosphere were really great!!

Review of cinch presents Creamfields South
reviews.body: Brill lineup and huge venue. It's a shame the food and drink prices are insainely high even for a fest and that the sound system kept failing during performances.

faqs.question: When is Creamfields South?
faqs.answer: Creamfields South takes place on Friday 26th - Sunday 28th May 2023.

faqs.question: How much are tickets for Creamfields South?
faqs.answer: 3-day tickets start from £220. 2 day tickets start from £195.

faqs.question: Where is Creamfields South?
faqs.answer:
Creamfields South is located in Chelmsford

Address:

Hylands Park

CM2 8WQ

faqs.question: Does Creamfields South have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer: Yes, 18’s and over – Challenge 21 in place. Photo ID required

faqs.question: Gold Ticket benefits?
faqs.answer: A Gold camping ticket includes access to the Gold campsite which features 'proper' toilets, showers, pamper parlour (with mirrors, hair straighteners, hairdryers etc), 24 hour manned Info Hub, free car parking plus access to the exclusive Hospitality Arena on site which will serve you up a complimentary meal each day. The Hospitality Arena also includes 'proper toilets', indoor and outdoor seating areas, leather sofas, wooden flooring, plus access to various exclusive concessions inside the hospitality arena* If you are purchasing a Gold Day ticket - you get everything within the Gold Package (excluding the camping features) + free car parking. A Gold camping ticket does not include Dreamfields accommodation or a pre-pitched tent, you still need to bring your own tent. Alternatively, you can book Dreamfields or Pre Pitch accommodation separately *Chargeable

faqs.question: Are pre-payment plan tickets available?
faqs.answer: No, there aren't any payment plans available for this event.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately, we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

news.title: Creamfields South reveals epic lineup ft. Carl Cox, Annie Mac, Fatboy Slim...
news.summary: The colossal Arc Stage will also make its first appearance at the Essex-based sister event of Creamfields North, with revered dance labels Trick and Paradise set to host the Runway Stage

news.title: Creamfields South to debut the iconic Arc Stage in 2023
news.summary: The focal point of Creamfields North, the mammoth Arc Stage will make the long trip down to Chelmsford in time for the second edition of Creamfields South this May

news.title: Creamfields South tickets on sale now
news.summary: Creamfields South have announced a huge line-up for 2023 and tickets are on sale now.
